Issues.Title: Updates the language used for see also section reference in documenta…
Issues.Body:
Fixes #3499 
`See the See Also section` is changed to `Check the See Also section`.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed or merged PR "Updates the language used for see also section reference in documenta…" (#3500)

Issues.Title: improve see also reference in documentation
Issues.Body: documentation in multiple pages has: "See the See Also section", which does not sound good. We should change that to perhaps: "Check the see also"
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "improve see also reference in documentation" (#3499)

Issues.Title: [One line change] Replace a xref with cref in XML

Issues.Body: As title.

Issues.Title: PcaModelParameters class documentation
Issues.Body:
PcaModelParameters class documentation doesn't follow the template for other model parameters classes, and contains remarks that are usually on the trainer class.

Also, the name of the class doesn't match its trainer's name: RandomizedPcaTrainer.

_Originally posted by @yaeldekel in https://github.com/dotnet/machinelearning/issues/3512#issuecomment-485571762_
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "PcaModelParameters class documentation" (#3515)

Issues.Title: KmeansTrainer sasys use itself to create itself
Issues.Body:
A trainer should be created by its public API, not itself.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3524474/56535819-75fee800-6511-11e9-8515-a0c5e03b283b.png)

This trainer's documentation also has formatting problems such as missing space.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "KmeansTrainer sasys use itself to create itself" (#3514)

Issues.Title: SDCA Regression Documentation Misses Type of Input Feature Vector
Issues.Body:
I am not sure if we need to mention input feature type, vector of Single, in that document.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3524474/56535123-e6a50500-650f-11e9-8a8f-dbb9a632c1f6.png)
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "SDCA Regression Documentation Misses Type of Input Feature Vector" (#3513)

Issues.Title: OneVersusAllModelParameters class documentation
Issues.Body:
Doesn't follow the template other model parameters classes use:
"The model parameters class for <trainer name>".

The OlsModelParameters class also doesn't follow this template.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "OneVersusAllModelParameters class documentation" (#3512)

Issues.Title: Documentation of ModelParametersBase<TOutput> class
Issues.Body:
"A base class for predictors producing TOutput. Note: This provides essentially no value going forward. New predictors should just derive from the interfaces they need."

If we are moving away from the word "predictor" we should remove it here. Also, I am not sure the "note" provides any value to the reader.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Documentation of ModelParametersBase<TOutput> class" (#3510)

Issues.Title: Fixes for the DataCatalog
Issues.Body:
* [ ] FilterRowsByKeyColumnFraction  example is too noisy, no need fr two columns, and especially such a busy one as the second. 
* [ ] Example data chosen in FilterRowsByMissingValues  should be simplified as well. 
* [ ] ShuffleRows - shuffleSource needs better documentation.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Fixes for the DataCatalog " (#3509)

Issues.Title: LinearModelParameterStatistics class documentation issue
Issues.Body: The documentation says "statistics for linear predictor", should instead say "statistics for linear model parameters".
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "LinearModelParameterStatistics class documentation issue" (#3508)

Issues.Title: [AUTOML] fixed path bug and regression metrics correction
Issues.Body:
Fix the model path bug in generated project:
- When run through dotnet cli the execution context seems to be different and the project is not able to find the model.zip.

Fix the metric in generated project for regression:
- RMS is reported wrong.
@justinormont  already has a PR for this but his PR seems to have test failures so I have included his changes in here. #3459 

closes #3459
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed or merged PR "[AUTOML] fixed path bug and regression metrics correction" (#3504)

Issues.Title: Inheritance of LbfgsLogisticRegressionBinaryTrainer.Options class doesn't have links
Issues.Body:
Inheritance
Microsoft.ML.Trainers.LbfgsTrainerBase`3+OptionsBaseLbfgsLogisticRegressionBinaryTrainer.Options
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Inheritance of LbfgsLogisticRegressionBinaryTrainer.Options class doesn't have links" (#3507)

Issues.Title: OneHotHashIndicator has the parameter descriptions under outputColumnName
Issues.Body:
Not displaying the descriptions correctly.

https://review.docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/microsoft.ml.categoricalcatalog.onehothashencoding?view=ml-dotnet&branch=smoke-test-preview#Microsoft_ML_CategoricalCatalog_OneHotHashEncoding_Microsoft_ML_TransformsCatalog_CategoricalTransforms_System_String_System_String_Microsoft_ML_Transforms_OneHotEncodingEstimator_OutputKind_System_Int32_System_UInt32_System_Boolean_System_Int32_
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "OneHotHashIndicator has the parameter descriptions under outputColumnName" (#3506)

Issues.Title: Bias term is usually missing in scoring rules of linear models
Issues.Body:
SymbolicSgdLogisticRegressionBinaryTrainer returns a linear model with bias but the bias term is not included in the scoring discussion shown below.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3524474/56528639-5f05c900-6504-11e9-8486-0eee911be59d.png)
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Bias term is usually missing in scoring rules of linear models" (#3505)

Issues.Title: SdcaNonCalibratedBinaryTrainer document has formatting error and is hard to read
Issues.Body:
In addition to some formatting errors, all details are shown in a huge paragraph.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3524474/56527933-4812a700-6503-11e9-9449-a1b58dfe459f.png)
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "SdcaNonCalibratedBinaryTrainer document has formatting error and is hard to read" (#3503)

Issues.Title: LpNorm and GcNorm doc math equations
Issues.Body:
Math display error in the LpNormNormalizingEstimator:
$y = \frac{x - \mu(x)}{L(x)}$

As well as in the GlobalContrastNormalizingEstimator.

https://review.docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/microsoft.ml.transforms.lpnormnormalizingestimator?view=ml-dotnet&branch=smoke-test-preview

https://review.docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/microsoft.ml.transforms.globalcontrastnormalizingestimator?view=ml-dotnet&branch=smoke-test-preview
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "LpNorm and GcNorm doc math equations" (#3502)

Issues.Title: SdcaLogisticRegressionBinaryTrainer documentation is hard to read
Issues.Body:
The discussion of algorithm and regularization are mixed into a big paragraph. It'd nicer to split them into different sections.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3524474/56527695-e5211000-6502-11e9-99a2-4d42e039f14a.png)
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "SdcaLogisticRegressionBinaryTrainer documentation is hard to read" (#3501)

Issues.Title: AveragedPerceptronTrainer's output schema is not correct
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "AveragedPerceptronTrainer's output schema is not correct" (#3498)

Issues.Title: [Fix Latex Code] Use textbr for vectors
Issues.Body: `boldsymbol` is ams package, which is not included in the official latex. This PR replaces `boldsymbol` with `textbf +textit`. Hopefully, this can fix the latex rendering of my docs.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open PR "[Fix Latex Code] Use textbr for vectors" (#3497)

Issues.Title: Missing details in LinearSvmTrainer
Issues.Body: There is only one short description for the mentioned trainer: `Linear SVM that implements PEGASOS for training. See: http://ttic.uchicago.edu/~shai/papers/ShalevSiSr07.pdf`. We should extend it to actually connect symbols in referenced paper and our implementation.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Missing details in LinearSvmTrainer" (#3496)
